snippet: Totems of pop culture, as well as a number of dogs, feature prominently in automakers' commercials for the Super Bowl, as Stuart Elliott writes.
abstract: Totems of pop culture, as well as a number of dogs, feature prominently in automakers' commercials for the Super Bowl, as Stuart Elliott writes.
lead_paragraph: As Stuart Elliott reported in The Times, car manufacturers have prereleased their Super Bowl commercials on the Web and begun multiplatform campaigns to generate buzz before the ads' broadcast debuts. A selection of some of the most viewed, and costly, spots can be viewed within Mr. Elliott's report. Read more »

headline.main: Ferris, Darth and Dogs, Lots of Dogs, Populate Automakers' Super Bowl Spots
